alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 7:29PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lake County through 800 PM PDT... At 728 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Abert Rim Geology, or 27 miles north of Lakeview, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abert Rim Geology. This includes the following highways... Highway 31 in Oregon between mile markers 114 and 118. US 395 in Oregon between mile markers 65 and 86. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
